Articles.Content:
Whats up everyone! The names Tidus Klein (not my real name:P).

I have had the full game now for about 2 weeks and have 16 flights active: five crash sites( mainly test planes and 1 large rover), 1 station, 6 mun landings, and four floaters:D (or space craft that have run out of fuel). I have one mod and its a robot arm mod that I never use.

I am currently working on a project to get a small rover to eve, I just can't get in to a orbit around the purple planet or I reto burn and run out of gas just to skip right past.

Any help is welcome! (but I believe all my problems are in my designs)

Edited June 26, 2013 by Tidus Klein
Welcome Tidus! (: If you ever need any help feel free to private message me! (:
